Special: Power Field, Tearing, Unwieldy, SM Wep

Note: Chaos Legionary Weapon. Dangerous to own. Can only be used whilst wearing Terminator Armour or some equally bulky equivilent. Doubles Strength Bonus. Attached to a bulky gauntlet which can only be used for basic manipulation (couldn't use a weapon or write, but could pick something up)
